snippet: The caddie Steve Williams, 50, had expressed a desire to scale back the number of weeks he spent on the road, a plan that did not appeal to Adam Scott.
abstract: Adam Scott parts ways with caddie Steve Williams after Williams expresses a desire to scale back the number of weeks he spends on the road; Williams helped guide Scott to his only major championship, the 2013 Masters, and to the world No.1 ranking during their four-year partnership.
lead_paragraph: The caddie Steve Williams, 50, had expressed a desire to scale back the number of weeks he spent on the road, a plan that did not appeal to Adam Scott.

headline.main: Adam Scott Splits With Caddie, Who Hopes to Travel Less
headline.print_headline: Scott Splits With Caddie, Who Hopes to Travel Less
